Package com.mimecast.robin.mime.parts

Class MimePart

java.lang.Object
com.mimecast.robin.mime.parts.MimePart
Direct Known Subclasses:
FileMimePart, MultipartMimePart, PdfMimePart, TextMimePart
public abstract class MimePart extends Object
MIME part container abstract.
